welcome-text: Welcome to Renting-Selling-app, keep everything managed!
name: Name
slide-first: Welcome to the simple yet professional Rent & Sell Management app!
slide-second: Effortlessly track and manage your rental and sales business in one place.
slide-third: Completely free to use—get started now!
stuffTooltip: You can manage you stuff (things to rent) here!
howManyDaysClaim: How many days want to rent
underDev: This site is under development! Please wait for final result!!!
needToBeReturned: Need To Be Returned Before Closing Contract

resp.401: You Are NOT Logged In, Please Sign In First
resp.1001: Items To Return Are More Than Remaining
resp.1002: Contract Is Closed Succuessfuly, So Cannot Be Changed!

hiw.two: If you run a sales or rental business and need an all-in-one solution to manage everything from start to finish, RSApp.ir is the ideal choice for you.
hiw.multLangDes: RSApp.ir currently supports English and Farsi, with more languages coming soon.
hiw.respDesignDes: Works flawlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
hiw.freeToUseDes: All RSApp.ir features are currently available completely free of charge.
hiw.quickSetupDes: Create your store account and become the admin in under one minute.
hiw.employeeUsersCreationDes: Admins can create custom user accounts for employees with specific permissions.
hiw.custManagementDes: Easily add new customers for selling or renting items.
hiw.inventoryManagementDes: Define and manage items—tools, clothing, vehicles, and more—and keep track of stock levels.
hiw.contractManagementDes: Automatically create and track contracts from open to close.
hiw.returnManagementDes: Manage the return status of rented items directly within contract details.
hiw.paymentTrackingDes: Record and track payments for all contracts.
hiw.reportingDes: Generate detailed reports on sales, rentals, payments, and profits to gain clear insights into your business performance.
hiw.realTimeStatsDes: View up-to-date metrics on contracts, inventory status, and revenue directly from your dashboard.

about.title: Welcome to RSApp.ir!
about.subtitle: Simplifying Rent and Sell Business Management
about.missionText: At RSApp.ir, we aim to streamline and simplify the management of rent and sell businesses. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools designed to make your rent and sell operations more efficient and effective.
about.thankYouText: We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to the technologies and platforms that made RSApp.ir possible:
about.microsoft: Microsoft .NET Framework: For providing a robust and scalable backend framework.
about.angular: Angular: For offering a powerful and flexible frontend framework.
about.github: GitHub: For enabling seamless version control and collaboration.
about.bootstrap: Bootstrap: For helping us create a responsive and visually appealing design.
about.explore: Explore our platform and see how RSApp.ir can transform your rental business management!

about.title: About Us – RSApp.ir | Free Rental & Sales Management Software
about.description: Learn how RSApp.ir empowers small businesses with a Free Plan to manage sales, rentals, contracts, inventory and profit reporting—completely free and multilingual.

feature.title: Features – Free Rental & Sales Platform | RSApp.ir
feature.description: Discover RSApp.ir’s Free Plan features: customer CRM, contract automation, inventory control and real-time profit analytics—all at no cost.

welcome.title: Welcome to RSApp.ir | Free Rental & Sales Management Platform
welcome.description: Get started with RSApp.ir’s Free Plan—create contracts, track payments, manage inventory, and view profit reports on a free, multilingual dashboard.

signup.title: Sign Up – Start Your Free Plan on RSApp.ir
signup.description: Join RSApp.ir’s Free Plan today and simplify your sales and rental workflows with powerful CRM, contract, inventory, and reporting tools.

login.title: Login – RSApp.ir Free Dashboard | Rental & Sales Management
login.description: Log in to your RSApp.ir Free Plan dashboard—manage customers, contracts, inventory, and profit insights in one unified platform.
